meanings.definition: The quality or state of being excessive or extravagant.
meanings.sent1: Her exorbitances in spending led to financial troubles.
meanings.sent2: The exorbitances of the party decorations amazed everyone.
meanings.sent3: His exorbitances in collecting toy cars made his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: The exorbitances of her dreams reached the stars.
meanings.sent5: The exorbitances of the buffet left no one hungry.

meanings.definition: Excessive or extravagant behavior or actions.
meanings.sent1: The exorbitances of his demands made it hard to work with him.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her exorbitances in gift-giving during the holidays.
meanings.sent3: The exorbitances of the dog's barking startled the neighbors.
meanings.sent4: His exorbitances in storytelling made him the life of the party.
meanings.sent5: The exorbitances of the fireworks display lit up the night sky.
